channel.title: Anyone know any good instrumental bands?
channel.description:
Anyone know any good instrumental bands?
I was in my car listening to my friend's iPod and he had this amazing jungle instrumental music that he ripped off a Final Fantasy XI soundtrack torrent. It was so amazing. We were blazing and I felt like I was in another world. Any way, it really inspired me to listen to more instrumental music and I would really like to know more bands.
Thank you. :)

I’ve been looking for this song for ages, I couldn’t remember the name.
